title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.93 - Service connections
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.93 - Service connections

State Regulations

Service connections through an exterior wall of the machine, including water, gas, electrical and refrigeration connections, are to be grommeted or closed to prevent the entrance of insects and rodents. Service connections to machines vending potentially hazardous food are to be such as to discourage their unauthorized or unintentional disconnection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-5.93

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
